column4: Hi - I setup this Ubuntu install for a friend using my Acer LCD Flat Panel - I'm taking to him today - But he has a older style CRT Monitor - I have the option under Screen Resolution of 59Hz - 58Hz - 57Hz - It is currently 59Hz - Would the lower setting Hertz be better to use ? ?-
I used an Nvidia FX 5200 AGP for video.
check the monitor specs and use the highest setting possible
59Hz horizontal on a crt invites headache
